participant_1.name: Alice
participant_1.background: I'd brag about how good my cake baking skills are. I enjoy working out and staying active, even though my work life is boring. I don't go to Comic Con because it is not my kind of thing. I work as an extra for major motion pictures. I have always wanted to travel to Ireland or Puerto Rico.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.background: My social media life is pretty low-key, because I'm more focused on my studies. I live alone with my dog. I enjoy playing soccer. I like tailgate parties. I have a loving family and we love animals.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I love playing soccer, going to tailgate parties, and spending time with my family and dog.
Sounds like you're busy! I work as an extra for major motion pictures, and I love working out and baking.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be an extra in a movie.
It's a lot of fun! I've met some really interesting people and had some great experiences.
What's your favorite movie that you've been in?
That's a tough question! I've been in a lot of great movies, but I think my favorite was probably "The Avengers."
Wow, that's amazing! I'm sure that was a great experience.
It was! I got to work with some of the best actors in the world.
That's awesome! I'm sure you have some great stories to tell.
I do! I'd be happy to tell you some of them sometime.
